page.title: 15Recreation at Gleadless
page.content: Lees Hall golf course is one of the most popular recreation spots locally.Faclilities also include snooker,darts,dominoes,cards and television. They have a dance once a month.They sell sandwiches and also provide Sunday dinners and special dinners for visiting golfing parties.Sometimes they have special events where all the family can join in.They sell computer games. Handicapped people are catered for.If you join the club you are given a score-card which tells you how many yards there are between each hole.It is an eighteen hole golf course.
